title: Bloomberg Markets: Butters on Fiat Chrysler Files Diesel Fix
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Butters on Fiat Chrysler Files Diesel Fix
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jamie Butters U.S. Autos Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Fiat Chrysler's attempt to fix to its diesel engines to resolve Justice Department concerns.
